mapper.select: SELECT ID, JOB_NAME, JOB_GROUP, JOB_STATUS, CASE JOB_STATUS WHEN 0 THEN '运行中' WHEN 1 THEN '暂停' WHEN 2 THEN '已完成' WHEN 3 THEN '异常' WHEN 4 THEN '阻塞' WHEN - 1 THEN '无' ELSE '错误状态码' END AS jobStatusDesc, JOB_DESCRIPTION, CRON_EXPRESSION, TRIGGER_ID FROM schedule_job where (JOB_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword} , '%')) OR (JOB_DESCRIPTION LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword} , '%')) OR (JOB_GROUP LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword} , '%'))
